channel.title: security on AbhiTaker
channel.description: Recent content in security on AbhiTaker

item.title: So You Think You Have Privacy?
item.description: For years I have known that privacy is a myth and has become a defunct concept. All the tech giants who are in active-pursuit to control the Internet have made sure that it’s hard to care about privacy. But then one day I stumbled upon this podcast that made me realize that the majority is unaware of this fact.

item.title: Changes are Inevitable
item.description: No doubt, changes are inevitable. The person who resists the changes that are for his/her good is no better than a dead person. I had to make a change.
